term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - explosivity limits (explosion limits)
term.title: explosivity limits

item.text: The concentration limits, usually of a substance in air, between which combustion will be self-sustaining.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2188 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
